name: Slavoj McAllister
description: Slavoj McAllister is the frontman of theCartesian Duelists, an industrial rock band. On June 10th,2077,Slavoj McAllister caused a violent outbreak at theMaelstromcontrolledTotentanznightclub inNorthside,Watson, throwing a tear gas canister at the paparazzi in the crowd. Before this ensued, he and his band premiered their new songs titled "Cybernetic Soul", "Mind Is Freedom", and "Corgito Ergo Sum", which were met with mixed response. A new album from the Cartesian Duelists for a release soon, and according to rumors on theNetit will be titled "War of Truths".
